name: OR_LNLG_OTH_EQUIP
description: This table contains the Other Equipment information for the procedural log.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_ID
columns.description: The ID of the other equipment.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_SET_T_NAME
columns.description: The setting type for the other equipment.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_SET_HI
columns.description: The high setting for the equipment.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_SET_LO
columns.description: The low setting for the equipment

columns.name: OTH_EQUIP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of the other equipment.

columns.name: HYST_PUMP_ID
columns.description: The ID of the hysteroscopy pump equipment that has settings to be documented.

columns.name: HYST_PUMP_PRESSURE
columns.description: The pressure setting (mmHg) for the hysteroscopy pump.

columns.name: HYST_PUMP_DEFICIT
columns.description: The deficit setting (mL) for the hysteroscopy pump.

columns.name: HYST_PUMP_T_INFLOW
columns.description: The total inflow setting (mL) for the hysteroscopy pump.

columns.name: LAP_SCN_ID
columns.description: The ID of the laparoscopic instrument scan equipment that has settings to be documented.

columns.name: CELL_SAVER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the cell saver machine equipment that has settings to be documented.

columns.name: CELL_SAVER_NUM
columns.description: The numeric or alphanumeric identifier for the cell saver machine.

columns.name: HYST_PUMP_ALM_SE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the hysteroscopy pump alarm settings are within limits. Y indicates that the alarm settings are within limits. N indicates that the alarm settings are not within limits.

columns.name: LAP_SCN_PRERD_C_NAME
columns.description: The category title of the pre-op reading (intact/compromised/NA) for the laparoscopic instrument scan.

columns.name: LAP_SCN_POSTRD_C_NAME
columns.description: The category title of the post-op reading (intact/compromised/NA) for the laparoscopic instrument scan.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_LAT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores laterality for other equipment.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_CAV_WID
columns.description: Document the cavity width measurement, as measured by other equipment type.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_CAV_LEN
columns.description: Document the cavity length measurement, as measured by other equipment type.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_PWR_LOW
columns.description: Document the low power for other equipment type.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_PWR_HI
columns.description: Document the high power for other equipment type.

columns.name: OTH_EQUIP_PWR_UNI_C_NAME
columns.description: Document the power unit for other equipment type.

columns.name: HYST_PUMP_T_OUTFLOW
columns.description: The total outflow setting (mL) for the hysteroscopy pump.

columns.name: CELL_SVR_VOL_PROC
columns.description: This column contains information about the number of milliliters of blood processed during surgery.

columns.name: CELL_SVR_VOL_REINFU
columns.description: This column contains information about the number of milliliters of blood reinfused during surgery.

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_CYCLES
columns.description: This item stores the number of cycles setting for a piece of ablation equipment.

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_SITES
columns.description: This item stores the number of ablation sites to which this piece of equipment was applied.

columns.name: TEMPERATURE
columns.description: This item stores the temperature for a piece of ablation equipment.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_VOLUME
columns.description: This item stores the volume, as measured by other equipment type.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_SER_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the serial number of other equipment type.

columns.name: AVERAGE_POWER
columns.description: The average power used.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_SOUNDING_LEN
columns.description: This column stores the sounding length measurement in centimeters, as measured by a piece of equipment.

columns.name: OTHER_EQUIP_SETTING_ADDITIONAL
columns.description: This column stores additional equipment settings.

columns.name: CELL_SVR_VOL_NOT_PROCESSED
columns.description: The milliliters of blood not processed.

columns.name: CELL_SVR_VOL_WASTED
columns.description: The milliliters of blood wasted.

columns.name: CELL_SVR_IRRIGATION_VOL
columns.description: This column stores the Irrigation volume used for cell saver.

columns.name: CELL_SVR_ANTICOAG_VOL
columns.description: This column stores the anti-coagulant volume used for cell saver.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ON_CART_YN
columns.description: If there was an implant not on the cart. Used for comprehensive steam sterilization (IUSS) documentation.
